Actions.Name: Blowdart
Actions.Description: The Darter shoots a toxic dart at a foe in range 5, inflicting lowlander poison and marking them.
Actions.Mark: While marked, the foe is inflicted with a maddening toxin and must save at the start of their turn. On successful save, a foe is shoved 1 in a direction on the Darter's choice. On a failed save, the Darter controls that foe's standard movement that turn, then the mark ends.
